text: The App Store is a digital distribution platform developed and maintained by Apple for tvOS apps for the Apple TV digital media player. It was announced on September 9, 2015. == Development == tvOS features all-new development tools for developers, and tvOS supports a brand-new SDK that lets developers build apps for TV, including all the APIs included in iOS 9, such as Metal. It also adds an app store where users can browse, download, and install a variety of applications. Additionally, developers can now use their own interfaces within their applications, rather than just Apple's. == References == == Other websites == * Apple Developer Program Category:Apple software
title: App Store (tvOS)
